mapper.select: SELECT p.*, d.departmentName FROM Professor p LEFT JOIN department d ON p.department_no = d.department_no
mapper.insert: INSERT Professor (professor_id, professor_name, professor_phone, professor_email, password1, password2, password_question, password_answer, department_no) VALUES ( #{professor_id}, #{professor_name}, #{professor_phone}, #{professor_email}, #{password1}, #{password2},#{password_question}, #{password_answer}, #{department_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE Professor SET professor_id = #{professor_id}, professor_name = #{professor_name}, professor_phone = #{professor_phone}, professor_email = #{professor_email}, department_no = #{department_no}, password = #{password}, password_question = #{password_question}, password_answer = #{password_answer}, WHERE professor_no = #{professor_no}
